mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS id, m.number AS number, m.name AS name, m.brand AS brand, b.batch_number AS batch_number, m.specification_attribute_id AS specification_attribute_id, sa.attribute_key AS attribute_key, sa.attribute_value AS attribute_value, m.expiry_date AS expiry_date, m.manufacturer AS manufacturer, m.unit AS unit, m.count AS count, m.status AS status, se.location AS location FROM Medicine m LEFT JOIN SpecificationAttribute sa ON m.specification_attribute_id = sa.id LEFT JOIN MedicineStorage ms ON m.id = ms.medicine_id LEFT JOIN storageenvironment se ON se.id = ms.storage_env_id LEFT JOIN medicine_batch mb ON m.id = mb.medicine_id LEFT JOIN batch b ON mb.batch_id = b.id
